key.name: compositing-manager
key.description: Determines whether Metacity is a compositing manager.

key.name: reduced-resources
key.summary: If true, trade off usability for less resource usage
key.description: If true, metacity will give the user less feedback by using wireframes, avoiding animations, or other means. This is a significant reduction in usability for many users, but may allow legacy applications to continue working, and may also be a useful tradeoff for terminal servers. However, the wireframe feature is disabled when accessibility is on.
